physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of seven people. Several of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Most of them are bare-chested and only wearing their military shorts and boots. They are also smoking cigarettes and one of them is holding a bottle. A military truck is behind them to the right. On the other side behind them to the left
 there are several people and another military truck.

Several of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Most of them are bare-chested and only wearing their military shorts and boots.
